resources.string: You can choose another lesson or repeat this one.
This is the word you will learn
Press Voice button to hear how a word is spoken correctly
Press Show Hint to see word in hiragana, romaji, and its meaning
Press and hold the Recording button to record your voice
Press Next to learn the next word
A technique to learn new vocabularies, listening, and speaking of foreign language
Hear how a word is spoken correctly
Repeating as close as possible to what you have heared
See the description / transcript if you don\'t get it correct and repeat again
